pages.title: Imagine Anything. Create Everything!
pages.subtitle: Welcome to Gen AI Video, the app that turns your imagination into stunning videos. Simply enter your text and let our AI do the magic.

pages.title: Manage and Organize Your Creations!
pages.subtitle: Easily access and manage all your Gen AI videos in one place. Edit, delete, or share your masterpieces with ease.

pages.title: Choose from Multiple AI Models
pages.subtitle: Access powerful AI models like Veo 3, Sora 2, Kling and more. Each model brings unique capabilities to bring your vision to life.
